acceptedAnswer.text: Optimum offers free Self-Setup, and if thatâ€™s not an option, customers can take advantage of free Pro-Install. However, if Self-Setup is available and the customer opts not to use it, a $100 installation fee will apply.

Optimum Internet prices begin at $40/month* for 300 Mbps download speed and vary based on your selected plan.
*For 12 mos. w/ $10 ACH Autopay discount for Internet and/or Video services. In select markets only. View Full Disclaimer.

mainEntity.name: Can you get Optimum Internet only?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, you can get a subscription to standalone Optimum Internet plans.

mainEntity.name: Does Optimum place data limits on its internet plans?

acceptedAnswer.text: No, all Optimum Internet plans come with no data caps policy.

mainEntity.name: Is Altice and Optimum the same?

acceptedAnswer.text: Altice is a parent company that owns the brand Optimum, one of the largest broadband communication and video service providers in the US.
